channel.description: Recent content in AT on Mathematics Seminars List

item.title: Augmentations and exact Lagrangian surfaces.
item.description: Augmentations are some algebraic invariants of Legendrian that are tightly related to both embedded and immersed exact Lagrangian fillings. We will talk about various relations between embedded and immersed exact Lagrangian surfaces using tools related to augmentations.
